messages.message:
Hey @mfichman,
CI is failing again on my backport PR due to test failures in `deployment_accessor_test.go`.

It looks like a TLS handshake error related to a certificate issue:
```[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] ----------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] FAIL: shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db/accessor/deployment_accessor_test.go:32: DeploymentAccessorTestSuite.SetUpSuite
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] 
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db/accessor/deployment_accessor_test.go:34:
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z]     s.testDB = NewTestDB(c, TestConfig{Dialect: s.dialect})
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db/session/testsession.go:103:
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z]     c.Assert(err, IsNil)
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] ... value *errors.errorString = &errors.errorString{s:"TLS Handshake failed: tls: failed to parse certificate from server: x509: negative serial number"} ("TLS Handshake failed: tls: failed to parse certificate from server: x509: negative serial number")
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] 
[2025-05-09T06:13:48.130Z] 2025/05/09 06:00:04 level=ERROR path=utils/db/session/dbsession.go:440 msg="SQL DB: TLS Handshake failed: tls: failed to parse certificate from server: x509: negative serial number" operation=db/session/DBSessionImpl.Exec```
CI Job link: instabase/view/change-requests/job/PR-70465/6/console (https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/instabase/view/change-requests/job/PR-70465/6/console)
PR Link: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/70465

@jayapandian.ponraj has force-merged the PR to unblock me for now, but just wanted to flag this in case it needs follow-up.

cc @Heymian
Ah, we need to backport my fix from master
